response.responseTooltip: Seeing no alternative, you choose to defend yourself against this angry [attacker.race].

openingDescriptions.combatant: Refusing to apologise in such a demeaning way, you tell the [attacker.race] that [attacker.sheIs] making a mistake as you prepare to defend yourself.
